title: Halibut with crab and lime croquettes
description: These crab and lime croquettes are great with any fried fish, but the vermouth sauce in this recipe really brings out the halibut flavours.
ingredients: rock salt, to cover base of a baking tray
100g/3½oz picked crab, white and brown meat
vegetable oil, for deep fat frying
salt and freshly ground black pepper
